entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:31 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
